result.eng: I went around the house several times.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé thart ar an teach cúpla uair
result.orig: Chuaigh mé thart ar an teach cúpla uair
result.html: Chuaigh mé thart ar an teach cúpla uairI went around the house several times.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé ṫart ar an teaċ cúpla uairI went around the house several times.

result.eng: How many times did they fail?
result.ga: Cá liacht uair a theip orthu
result.orig: Cá liacht uair a theip orthu
result.html: Cá liacht uair a theip orthuHow many times did they fail?
result.ponchtml: Cá liaċt uair a ṫeip orṫuHow many times did they fail?

result.ga: Tharla sé sin san am atá caite
result.orig: Tharla sé sin san am atá caite
result.html: Tharla sé sin san am atá caiteIt happened in past times.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla sé sin san am atá caiteIt happened in past times.

result.eng: I saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.
result.ga: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac Dara
result.orig: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac Dara
result.html: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac DaraI saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do ṁac DaraI saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.

result.eng: I am better now but I have a pain at times.
result.ga: Tá mé níos fearr anois ach bíonn pian orm uaireanta
result.orig: Tá mé níos fearr anois ach bíonn pian orm uaireanta
result.html: Tá mé níos fearr anois ach bíonn pian orm uaireantaI am better now but I have a pain at times.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé níos fearr anois aċ bíonn pian orm uaireantaI am better now but I have a pain at times.

result.eng: She was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ga: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.orig: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.html: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradhShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ponchtml: Buaileaḋ í roinnt uaireanta agus ċuaṫas i muinín an ḟornirt ċun a cuid gruaige a ḃearraḋShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.

result.eng: Sometimes the media pay attention to those cases, other times they don't.
result.ga: Amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní thugann
result.orig: Amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní thugann
result.html: Amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní thugannSometimes the media pay attention to those cases, other times they don't.
result.ponchtml: Amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní ṫugannSometimes the media pay attention to those cases, other times they don't.
